title: 【15w31a】骷髅的新NBT
author: mc的qiao
txt_content:
本帖最后由 mc的qiao 于 2015-7-31 17:58 编辑 

15w31a骷髅有了射箭的动作
我研究出了他的nbt
[04:33:50] 实体数据已更新：{UUIDLeast:-9027011332730030463L,Attributes:[0:{Name:"generic.maxHealth",Base:20.0d},1:{Name:"generic.knockbackResistance",Base:0.0d},2:{Name:"generic.movementSpeed",Base:0.25d},3:{Name:"generic.followRange",Base:16.0d,Modifiers:[0:{Name:"Random spawn bonus",UUIDLeast:-5560439562118824330L,Operation:1,Amount:0.08169324506018769d,UUIDMost:-6307623022432072908L}]},4:{Name:"generic.attackDamage",Base:2.0d}],Motion:[0:0.0d,1:0.0d,2:0.0d],SkeletonType:0b,Health:20s,HealF:20.0f,HandItems:[0:{id:"minecraft:bow",Damage:0s,Count:1b},1:{}],Fire:0s,ArmorItems:[0:{},1:{},2:{},3:{}],Invulnerable:0b,DeathTime:0s,AbsorptionAmount:0.0f,OnGround:0b,HurtTime:0s,UUIDMost:-2779967031116345473L,ArmorDropChances:[0:0.085f,1:0.085f,2:0.085f,3:0.085f],HurtByTimestamp:0,Dimension:0,Air:300s,Pos:[0:1195.5d,1:64.0d,2:-209.5d],CanPickUpLoot:1,PortalCooldown:0,PersistenceRequired:0b,<font size="4">HandDropChances:</font>[0:0.085f,1:0.085f],Leashed:0b,LeftHanded:0b,FallDistance:0.0f,Rotation:[0:70.60965f,1:0.0f]}复制代码

高频红石执行entitydata @e[type=Skeleton] {HandDropChances:1}复制代码就可以使骷髅不抬起手，也就是不攻击


不过会使骷髅的手臂不断抽搐

replies.author: End-Enderman
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 End-Enderman 于 2015-7-31 14:00 编辑 
mc的qiao 发表于 2015-7-31 12:45
不，是骷髅是否进入攻击状态
这就不对了。楼主代码HandDropChances:[0:0.085f,1:0.085f]就是跟手上物品的掉落几率有关。楼主可以去测试一下，并且你可以发现不单单骷髅有这个nbt。另外这个攻击状态我想有可能是一个bug，不能直接就说这是进入攻击状态的nbt。

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content:
End-Enderman 发表于 2015-7-31 13:56
这就不对了。楼主代码HandDropChances:[0:0.085f,1:0.085f]就是跟手上物品的掉落几率有关。楼主可以去测试 ...
比如说改这个值得时候骷髅刷新了他的手里的物品
于是暂时放下来了？
